author: ThrillSeeker
description:
Hello and welcome to, TUESDAY NEWSDAY! Your number one resource for the entire week's worth of VR news! Thank you to SideQuest for supporting my channel!

Go download their social VR app Banter for free on all platforms:
https://www.meta.com/experiences/banter/5404906916283287/?utm_source=thrill&utm_medium=youtube&utm_campaign=banter_update 
https://bantervr.com/?utm_source=thrill&utm_medium=youtube&utm_campaign=banter_update
https://discord.gg/bantaverse

We got some.. interesting news this week.. and in a lot of ways, since my last newsday, the entire industry's vibes shifted. 

Meta has abandoned the term "Virtual Reality" in its entirety while an internal memo made it clear that this year is essentially boom or bust for Meta's "mixed reality" endeavors- mixed reality being Meta's catch all term, replacing VR. 

In other news, we have some more leaks on Deckard, a couple interesting ways VR has entered the justice system.. AND, THE ORIGINAL FOUNDER OF OCULUS IS BACK in the VR indu
title: The Entire VR Industry Just Shifted
